Name: Volga Boatman
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Screwdriver served straight up with a twist of cherry.
History: Recipe adapted from David Embury's classic The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks . Named after the epic (and somewhat camp) Cecil b. De Mille movie, which took its name from a Russian folksong hymning the Volga - Europe's longest river.
Nutrition: One serving of Volga Boatman contains 164 calories
